page.title: 10Mayor's Inauguration
page.content: Pupils from Y Bont Faen and Cowbridge Comprehensive. {Apologies: }Councillors D.A. Thomas, D.C.H. Busher, K. Hutchings and H. Jenkins. Members of the Council assembled in the mayors parlour for robing and then took their seats in the Council Chamber. The Mayor welcomed everyone to this Mayormaking Ceremony. The Mayor then called upon the Reverend Gwilym Wiliams to open the proceedings with a prayer. The Mayor then called upon Councillor B.A. Gibbons to propose the Mayor for the ensuing year. Councillor J.L. Jones seconded the proposal. The Town Clerk then called upon the incoming Mayor to sign his Declaration of Acceptance of Office.
